analysis: The project contains a test-website with CSS, HTML, and JS files that need to be themed around black holes. The current CSS file is incomplete and lacks the cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs a mobile-friendly navigation menu, and the JavaScript file has syntax errors and incomplete functionality. The event.json specifies the topic as black holes with a theme of no bulk animated objects, slide, animated page, and about black holes.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Use colors like deep space black, cosmic purple, and star-like whites. Implement CSS animations for a rotating black hole effect and swirling background.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices. Ensure the layout is responsive and includes sections about black holes with animated content.

Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners for the new buttons and ensure smooth transitions for the mobile menu toggle functionality.
